name: Foresight Valuation
tag_list: intellectual-property, consulting, valuation, cleantech, energy, internet, software, nanotech, mobile
overview:
Foresight Valuation Group, LLC (FVG), based in Palo Alto, California, is a boutique intellectual property (IP) consulting firm that provides a full suite of analytical services related to the management and commercialization of intangible assets.

We help our clients understand the value of their intellectual property, by thinking strategically about how to manage and extract value from their intangible assets. At Foresight Valuation Group (FVG), we help organizations measure and optimize the real value of the intangible assets and intellectual property (IP) that drive their success. We build long-term relationships with our clients. That ensures an active and informed approach to managing their intellectual assets, from valuing their IP portfolio to planning effectively for commercialization and growth.

As IP experts based in Silicon Valley, we provide high-level, individualized service to start-ups and investors as well as to corporate giants. Our founders arenâ€™t just valuation experts and strategists, theyâ€™re entrepreneurs who have created IP in several start ups. Whether your business is large or small, well established or getting off the ground, FVG is your partner for IP. Specialties IP and Business Valuation (Accounting, Taxes, licensing, M&A), Litigation support (IP and general damages), IP Strategy (corporations, research institutions, inventors), Start-up services (business plan, financial modeling, investor representation)
